Hillsboro.Area codes 503 and 971:
North American telephone area codes 503 and 971 serve the northwestern region of Oregon, including the Portland, Salem, and Astoria metropolitan areas.


== History ==
Area code 503 was one of the original area codes created as part of the North American Numbering Plan by AT&T and Bell Laboratories in 1947.
Area code 503 originally covered the entire state of Oregon until November 5, 1995, when area code 541 began service.
